attributes.action: Get our homeless of the street.
attributes.additional_details:
It's our civic duty to help everyone. Not just the employed or the front line workers of which I am one.
We all deserve a fighting chance against what is happening to our world
attributes.background: Open old police stations, army barrics, anything to help get our homeless indoors while we all fight this pandemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302485

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
